text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaß sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>, mit viel schönen Kupferen, <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE> <YEAR>1632</YEAR>. <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE> <VOLUME>IT. Tomes</VOLUME>,<PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE> <YEAR>1744</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR> <TITLE>hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1684</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR> <TITLE>hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE> <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE> <YEAR>1679</YEAR></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>, <PLACE>Jena</PLACE> <YEAR>1727</YEAR>. <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE> <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE> <YEAR>1729</YEAR>. <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR> <TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE> <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE> <YEAR>1733</YEAR>. <VOLUME>11. Tomi</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Ein Frantzösischer Atlas</TITLE> von <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"Corrections involved fixing eight instances of character encoding errors (mojibake) and structural XML errors. Specific fixes include: 1. Decoding German umlauts and 'ß' (`Gaß`, `schönen`, `Frantzösischer`) and replacing place abbreviation moji-bake (`Jenß` to `Jena`). 2. Standardizing bibliographic format abbreviations (`8v6` and `4t¥` to `8vo` and `4to`). 3. Correcting the malformed `<TITLE=` tag in the Clericus entry to `<TITLE>`. 4. Escaping the unescaped ampersand (`&`) within the Clericus title (`&`)."}

parsed.explanation: Corrections involved fixing eight instances of character encoding errors (mojibake) and structural XML errors. Specific fixes include: 1. Decoding German umlauts and 'ß' (`Gaß`, `schönen`, `Frantzösischer`) and replacing place abbreviation moji-bake (`Jenß` to `Jena`). 2. Standardizing bibliographic format abbreviations (`8v6` and `4t¥` to `8vo` and `4to`). 3. Correcting the malformed `<TITLE=` tag in the Clericus entry to `<TITLE>`. 4. Escaping the unescaped ampersand (`&`) within the Clericus title (`&`).
